title: ROBOTS PLAYING IN CO-OP VS. AI GAMES
body: I've been playing in bot games for an enjoyable time and an easy game compared to PvP games, but its been hard when your playing with a bunch of robots who feed the entire time, how does riot not see this?!?!?! anyone else get games like these?

replies.body:
Happens all the time. This is the 132843760837 post about this issue on the boards so far. 

Riot do know, they just cant do much without people reporting the bots. The best way to counter this is to report the bots at the end of each game and move on. For extra fun, keep a list of the the bots summoner names and send a support ticket to riot for every 20 or so names you collect (so you aren't spammy).
Commonly happens in bot games. Sometimes in norms too. Rito would have to do something about it.
